abstract: Google will offer mobile payments with MasterCard and Citigroup, according to a person briefed on the introduction, as well as with cellphone carriers, hardware manufacturers and retailers.
snippet: Google will offer mobile payments with MasterCard and Citigroup, according to a person briefed on the introduction, as well as with cellphone carriers, hardware manufacturers and retailers.
lead_paragraph: Google is expected to introduce on Thursday a mobile payment system that will let shoppers wave their phones to pay instead of pulling out a credit card, according to people briefed on the announcement.

headline.main: Google Expected to Introduce a Wireless Payment System
headline.print_headline: Google Expected to Prepare A Wireless Payment System

byline.original: By Tara Siegel Bernard and Claire Cain Miller
